statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback
SELECT id, name, email FROM customer_feedback WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, email, created_at FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_feedback
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_feedback WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, complaint, created_at FROM customer_feedback WHERE name LIKE '%John%' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, complaint FROM customer_feedback WHERE created_at < '2021-01-01' AND complaint IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_feedback, MAX(created_at) AS last_feedback_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Complaints;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_date, complaint_text FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_date FROM Customer_Complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC
SELECT complaint_text, customer_id FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE complaint_id = '1234'
SELECT customer_id, complaint_date FROM Customer_Complaints WHERE complaint_text LIKE '%customer%'
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = '5678'
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints;
SELECT complaint_id, customer_id, complaint_text, date_submitted FROM CustomerComplaints;
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE date_submitted >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE complaint_text LIKE '%refund%'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_complaints FROM CustomerComplaints GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_complaints DESC
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE date_submitted >= '2021-01-01' AND date_submitted <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_submitted)) as avg_submission_time FROM CustomerComplaints GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_submission_time ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT resolution_text, resolved_by FROM resolutions WHERE date_resolved > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name, r.resolution_text FROM customers c JOIN resolutions r ON c.customer_id = r.complaint_id;
SELECT c.name, f.feedback_text, f.rating FROM customers c JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.rating > 3 ORDER BY f.date_given DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints;
SELECT complaint_text, date_submitted, customer_id FROM CustomerComplaints ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM Employees WHERE department_name = 'Sales';
SELECT customer_id, complaint_text FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM CustomerComplaints
SELECT complaint_id, customer_id, complaint_text, date_submitted FROM CustomerComplaints WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT c.complaint_id, c.complaint_text, r.resolution_text FROM CustomerComplaints c JOIN Resolutions r ON c.complaint_id = r.complaint_id
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM Employees e JOIN Departments d ON e.department_name = d.department_name
SELECT f.customer_id, f.feedback_text, f.rating, c.complaint_text FROM CustomerFeedback f JOIN CustomerComplaints c ON f.customer_id = c.customer_id
